Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Lagos Monitoring Team
Tunji Disu ga-anọchịte anya Abba Kyari
Onyeisi ndị uweojii Naịjiria bụ Usman Alkali Baba ahọpụtala Tunji Disu ka ọ nọchite Abba Kyari na ọkwa orụ ịbụ onyeisi Police Intelligence Response Team (IRT).
Akwusiri Abba Kyari  ọrụ n'ike n'ihi ebubo ịna aka azụ n'aka Abass Ramon onye e ji Hushpuppi mara.
Mgbọ egbe merụrụ ndị uweojii ahụ na mwakpo ndị oji egbe mere na Bende
Akwụsịla Abba Kyari ọrụ n'ihi ebubo ịnara Hushpuppi akaazụ
Usman Alkali kwupụtara nhọpụta nke a n'ụbọchị Monde dịka ndị otu Nigeria Police Commission mere nzukọ kpebie nke a. Onye bụ Tunji Disu?Tupu ahọpụta Tunji Disu maka ọkwa ịnọchị Abba Kyari:
Ọ bụbụ onyeisi ngalaba ọrụ uweọjii na-ahụ maka enyemaka ọnọdụ gbata gbata na Legọs Steetị nke bekee kpọrọ Rapid Response Squad (RRS).
Disu bụbụkwa osote Kọmịshọna ndị uweojii n'Abuja, rụkwa na ngalaba "operations" n'isi ụlọọrụ ndị uweojii n'Abuja.
N'oge gara aga ọ rukwara ọrụ dịka osote onyeisi ngalaba na-eme nyocha mpụ n'Rivas Steetị nke beekee kpọrọ State CID.
Maazị Disu sobụkwa na ndị uweojii otu African Union họpụtara ịrụ ọrụ ichekwa ụdọ na mba Sụdan
O gụrụ asusu bekee na mahadum nọ na Legọs bụ Lagos State University (LASU).
Ọ gukwara akwụkwọ ruo ogogo "Masters" na mahadum nọ na Ondo Steeti bụ Adekunle Ajasin University.
O gukwara akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ banyere ọrụ ncheckwa na mahadum ole m ole na Naijịrịa nakwa mba ofesi.
